select a.*,b.examine_status,b.record_id as examine_record_id,b.examine_step_id,c.title as categoryTitle,c.icon,c.examine_type from wk_oa_examine a left join wk_oa_examine_record b on a.examine_id = b.examine_id left join wk_oa_examine_category c on a.category_id = c.category_id left join wk_oa_examine_log d on d.record_id = b.record_id where 1 = 1
and a.category_id = #{data.categoryId}
and ((d.examine_user = #{userId} and d.examine_status = 0 and ifnull(b.examine_step_id,1) = ifnull(d.examine_step_id,1) and d.is_recheck !=1) or ((d.examine_user = #{userId} and d.examine_status not in(0,4))))
and (d.examine_user = #{userId} and d.examine_status = 0 and ifnull(b.examine_step_id,1) = ifnull(d.examine_step_id,1) and d.is_recheck !=1)
and (d.examine_user = #{userId} and d.examine_status not in(0,4) and d.is_recheck = 0)
and a.create_time between #{data.startTime} and #{data.endTime}
group by a.examine_id,b.examine_status,b.record_id
order by a.create_time desc
order by d.examine_time desc
order by d.create_time desc

select a.*,b.title as categoryTitle,b.examine_type as examineType, c.examine_status from wk_oa_examine as a left join wk_oa_examine_category b on a.category_id = b.category_id left join `wk_oa_examine_record` c on a.examine_id = c.examine_id where a.examine_id = #{examineId} and a.tenant_id = #{tenantId}

select a.examine_id,a.create_time,d.realname as create_user_name,a.money,a.content,a.remark,a.duration, b.start_address,b.end_address,b.start_time,b.end_time,b.traffic,b.stay,b.diet,b.other,b.money as travel_money, b.vehicle,b.trip,b.duration as travel_duration,b.description, (CASE WHEN f.examine_status = 0 THEN '未审核' WHEN f.examine_status = 1 THEN '审核通过' WHEN f.examine_status = 2 THEN '审核拒绝' WHEN f.examine_status = 3 THEN '审核中' WHEN f.examine_status = 4 THEN '已撤回' END ) as examine_status, (CASE WHEN f.examine_status in (0,3) THEN (select GROUP_CONCAT(realname) from wk_admin_user where user_id in ( select examine_user from wk_oa_examine_log where record_id = g.record_id and order_id = a.g.order_id)) WHEN f.examine_status in (1,2,4) THEN '' END ) as examine_user_name, (select GROUP_CONCAT(realname) from wk_admin_user where user_id in ( select examine_user from wk_oa_examine_log where record_id = g.record_id and order_id = (CASE WHEN f.examine_status in (0,3) THEN (g.order_id - 1) WHEN f.examine_status in (1,2,4) THEN g.order_id END) )) as previous_examine_user_name, c.customer_ids, c.contacts_ids, c.business_ids, c.contract_ids, if(c.customer_ids is null,null,(select GROUP_CONCAT(customer_name SEPARATOR'】、【') from wk_crm_customer where find_in_set(customer_id,c.customer_ids))) as customer_name, if(c.contacts_ids is null,null,(select GROUP_CONCAT(name SEPARATOR'】、【') from wk_crm_contacts where find_in_set(contacts_id,c.contacts_ids))) as contacts_name, if(c.business_ids is null,null,(select GROUP_CONCAT(business_name SEPARATOR'】、【') from wk_crm_business where find_in_set(business_id,c.business_ids))) as business_name, if(c.contract_ids is null,null,(select GROUP_CONCAT(name SEPARATOR'】、【') from wk_crm_contract where find_in_set(contract_id,c.contract_ids))) as contract_name from wk_oa_examine as a left join wk_oa_examine_travel as b on a.examine_id = b.examine_id left join wk_oa_examine_relation as c on a.examine_id = c.examine_id left join wk_admin_user as d on a.create_user_id = d.user_id left join wk_oa_examine_category as e on a.category_id = e.category_id left join wk_oa_examine_record as f on f.examine_id = a.examine_id left join (select max(order_id) as order_id,record_id from wk_oa_examine_log where is_recheck != 1 group by record_id) as g on f.record_id = g.record_id where a.examine_id in
#{id}

select distinct a.examine_id,a.content,a.money,a.create_time,a.end_time,u.realname,woer.examine_status from wk_oa_examine as a inner join wk_admin_user u on a.create_user_id = u.user_id inner join wk_oa_examine_relation r on a.examine_id = r.examine_id inner join wk_oa_examine_record woer on a.examine_id = woer.examine_id left join wk_crm_business b on r.business_ids like CONCAT(',',b.business_id,',') and b.customer_id = #{customerId} left join wk_crm_contract c on r.contract_ids like CONCAT(',',c.contract_id,',') and c.customer_id = #{customerId} where IFNULL(b.customer_id,c.customer_id) is not null

select distinct a.examine_id,a.content,a.money,a.create_time,a.end_time,u.realname,woer.examine_status from wk_oa_examine as a inner join wk_admin_user u on a.create_user_id = u.user_id inner join wk_oa_examine_relation r on a.examine_id = r.examine_id inner join wk_oa_examine_record woer on a.examine_id = woer.examine_id left join wk_crm_contract c on r.contract_ids like CONCAT(',',c.contract_id,',') where c.contract_id = #{contractId}

select distinct a.examine_id,a.content,a.money,a.create_time,a.end_time,u.realname,woer.examine_status from wk_oa_examine as a inner join wk_admin_user u on a.create_user_id = u.user_id inner join wk_oa_examine_relation r on a.examine_id = r.examine_id inner join wk_oa_examine_record woer on a.examine_id = woer.examine_id left join wk_crm_business b on r.business_ids like CONCAT(',',b.business_id,',') where b.business_id = #{businessId}
